title: Registered owner's responsibility; registration plates as prima facie evidence as to the fault of the registered owner
context: ยง286-24 Registered owner&rsquo;s responsibility; registration plates as prima facie evidence as to the fault of the registered owner. In any proceeding for violation of this part, the registered owner of a vehicle shall be deemed responsible for the unsafe condition of the vehicle. [L 1967, c 214, pt of ยง2; HRS ยง286-24]
